title: Kraken Arcaflow scenarios
description: Serial execution of Arcaflow Python plugins. See https://github.com/arcaflow for details.

namespace.title: Namespace
namespace.description: Namespace of the pod to which filter need to be appliedfor details.

image.title: Image
image.description: Image of the krkn tools to run network outage.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: List of directions to apply filtersDefault both egress and ingress.

ingress_ports.title: Ingress ports
ingress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

egress_ports.title: Egress ports
egress_ports.description: List of ports to block traffic onDefault [], i.e. all ports

kubeconfig_path.title: Kubeconfig path
kubeconfig_path.description:
Kubeconfig file as string
See https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/configuration/organize-cluster-access-kubeconfig/ for details.

pod_name.title: Pod name
pod_name.description: When label_selector is not specified, pod matching the name will beselected for the chaos scenario

label_selector.title: Label selector
label_selector.description: Kubernetes label selector for the target pod. When pod_name is not specified, pod with matching label_selector is selected for chaos scenario

kraken_config.title: Kraken Config
kraken_config.description: Path to the config file of Kraken. Set this field if you wish to publish status onto Cerberus

test_duration.title: Test duration
test_duration.description: Duration for which each step of the ingress chaos testing is to be performed.

wait_duration.title: Wait Duration
wait_duration.description: Wait duration for finishing a test and its cleanup.Ensure that it is significantly greater than wait_duration

instance_count.title: Instance Count
instance_count.description: Number of pods to perform action/select that match the label selector.
